caption.p: The Iridoviridae pan-genome and unique DIV-1 genes. Parameter settings A: minimal coverage 30%, minimal identity 30%, minimal connectivity 10%. Parameter settings B: minimal coverage 20%, minimal identity 20%, minimal connectivity 5%. The Venn diagram illustrates the Iridoviridae pan-genome and the number of shared and specific genes among DIV-1, the vertebrate (VIVs) and invertebrate (IIVs) iridoviruses based on ortholog clusters.
